title: 超小贩卖机！占地11个方块！求人气！
author: keai
txt_content:
新手第一次发帖，请见谅！【没存档哦~~】
首先要准备：2个漏斗，1个箱子，1个投掷器，3个红石，2个红石中继器，1个红石比较器，1个红石火把 ，方块若干                                                     
全图[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/7%25~Q[8OEX]I%60C5G0D4(CKJ4.jpg[/img] 
下面教大家做，我弄的是铁块换钻石...
第一步：file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/RFXO%25YVJ(A%7B%60$NNX]2CVX]N.jpg 
第二步：[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/W[%7D6PG_G%7D%7B59LN%600IK@L2$4.jpg[/img] 
第三步：file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/2MQ%7D7)%7DI5A4QRAZ@%25B%25~C.jpg 
第四步：[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/X@Z4%7DN$XB[1((@)%25K8TH3O3.jpg[/img] 
最重要的是放东西这个程序
上面漏斗里的东西这样放：[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/(%60196Z4[RGGBUVUDX)VO6ND.jpg[/img] 

下面漏斗的东西酱紫放：
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/GJLD$S8@N0$5O]KL_MJIDI4.jpg 
加上投掷器里的奖品就大功告成了！！！[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/550938591/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/KMW(O%7BNAS@@6LFPDPO[8%7D%7B3.jpg[/img] 
======================＞
